original: 莎呵爾時佛告諸大眾言。
analyzed: 莎呵爾時佛告諸大眾言。
translated: At that time, the Buddha said to the great assembly:
In the past, countless eons ago,
when I was still an ordinary person named Cetadhvaja,
I was a merchant in the country of Karambha,
engaged in trade with false and deceptive practices.
I committed innumerable evil deeds, beyond measure,
and engaged in licentious and unrestrained conduct, beyond description.

original: 是時愚癡害父愛母逕由數年。
analyzed: 是時愚癡害父愛母逕由數年。
translated: At that time, the foolish one harmed his father and loved his mother for many years.
The people of the whole country all knew about it.
They shouted, This is Cunda.
He has harmed his father and loved his mother for many years.

original: 吾時思念與六畜無異更無人事。
analyzed: 吾時思念與六畜無異更無人事。
translated: I thought, 'I am no different from the six animals, and there is no human relationship left.'
At that time, in the country of Karandhaka,
I jumped over the city wall at night and fled to the deep marshes.
At that time, the king of this country was named Vidhāra.
He announced to the people of the country,

original: 此遮他陀婬曠無道致為此事。
analyzed: 此遮他陀婬曠無道致為此事。
translated: This Cunda is licentious and has no principles, so he has done this.
If anyone can capture this person,
I will heavily reward them with precious objects.

original: 時此國人各各受募欲捕吾身。
analyzed: 時此國人各各受募欲捕吾身。
translated: At that time, the people of this country each accepted the offer and wanted to capture me.

original: 是時驚怖即出國作沙門。
analyzed: 是時驚怖即出國作沙門。
translated: At that time, I was frightened and left the country to become a monk.
In another country, I practiced the ten wholesome deeds.
I sat in meditation and studied the Way, weeping day and night.
For thirty-seven years,
because of the obstruction of the five heinous crimes,
my mind could not attain concentration, and I was filled with sorrow and distress.

original: 以三十七年中在於山窟。
analyzed: 以三十七年中在於山窟。
translated: For thirty-seven years, he stayed in a mountain cave.
He would always raise his voice and weep, saying, Alas, alas!
With what mind can one remove this suffering?
He would lament and go down to the cave to beg for food.
At that time, on the road, he found a large bowl.
Inside there was a box of scriptures, no other scriptures.

original: 唯有集法悅捨苦陀羅尼。
analyzed: 唯有集法悅捨苦陀羅尼。
translated: There was only the Dhāraṇī of Gathering the Dharma, Delighting in Abandoning Suffering.

original: 說過去恒河沙諸佛臨泥洹時。
analyzed: 說過去恒河沙諸佛臨泥洹時。
translated: It said that in the past, when the Buddhas as numerous as the sands of the Ganges were about to enter nirvāṇa,
They were always in the country of Vṛji.

original: 說此陀羅尼付諸大菩薩。
analyzed: 說此陀羅尼付諸大菩薩。
translated: They taught this dhāraṇī and entrusted it to the great bodhisattvas.

original: 後有人得聞此陀羅尼者。
analyzed: 後有人得聞此陀羅尼者。
translated: Later, if there were people who heard this dhāraṇī,
It meant that in their past lives,
They had cultivated the five precepts and ten wholesome deeds.
They should be allowed to hear it.
If there were people who heard it but did not keep it in mind,
And did not practice it, they were said to be without conditions.

original: 此陀羅尼能除去百億劫生死五逆大罪。
analyzed: 此陀羅尼能除去百億劫生死五逆大罪。
translated: This dhāraṇī could remove the great sins of birth and death and the five heinous crimes committed over a hundred koṭīs of kalpas.
If there were people who received and upheld it, recited it,

original: 終不墮於三塗地獄餓鬼畜生。
analyzed: 終不墮於三塗地獄餓鬼畜生。
translated: Will never fall into the three evil destinies of hell, hungry ghosts, or animals.
Why is this? In the past, the Buddhas,
When about to enter nirvana, would exclusively expound this.

original: 尊重歎仰稱其功德不可計量。
analyzed: 尊重歎仰稱其功德不可計量。
translated: They revered and praised it, and its merits and virtues are immeasurable.
They entrusted it to the Bodhisattvas, and later sentient beings,
Who hear this Dharani,
Will cultivate and uphold it, and the rewards of their blessings are incalculable.
It is like Mount Sumeru, the jeweled ocean,
Which ordinary beings cannot fathom.
If there are people who commit evil deeds,

original: 竊聞此陀羅尼名不及修習。
analyzed: 竊聞此陀羅尼名不及修習。
translated: But secretly hear the name of this Dharani without being able to cultivate it,
They will fall into hell.

original: 一切地獄中蒙此人恩苦痛不行。
analyzed: 一切地獄中蒙此人恩苦痛不行。
translated: All the hells will be spared from suffering due to the kindness of this person.
If there are people who can practice diligently in this life,

original: 修習得者覩見百千萬佛剎土。
analyzed: 修習得者覩見百千萬佛剎土。
translated: And cultivate to attain it, they will see hundreds of thousands of myriads of Buddha lands.
The blessings they attain are immeasurable and cannot be fully described.

original: 唯有諸佛與諸菩薩乃能究盡。
analyzed: 唯有諸佛與諸菩薩乃能究盡。
translated: Only the Buddhas and Bodhisattvas can fully understand it.

original: 聲聞二乘人者不能得知。
analyzed: 聲聞二乘人者不能得知。
translated: The two vehicles of the śrāvakas are unable to know it.
Why is this dhāraṇī?
It is not spoken by one or two buddhas.
It is spoken by the buddhas of the past, as numerous as the sands of the Ganges River.
At that time, after I obtained this sūtra,
I did not beg for food.
Joyfully, I went to the cave and, having arrived at the cave,
I burned incense, made obeisance, and praised it with tears of emotion.

original: 於窟中修習讀誦經一年。
analyzed: 於窟中修習讀誦經一年。
translated: In the cave, I practiced and recited the sūtra for a year.
At first, due to the obstruction of karmic offenses,
I was unable to enter and keep it in my mind.
At that time, I then bathed in the autumn moon night
and practiced for one seven-day period.

original: 如童子初學憒憒者不少。
analyzed: 如童子初學憒憒者不少。
translated: Like a young child first learning, it was quite chaotic.
I then practiced for another seven days.
It was also like this, no different from the chaos.
My mind was sorrowful and I did not know what to do.

original: 意中思惟此陀羅尼字書。
analyzed: 意中思惟此陀羅尼字書。
translated: I contemplated the written characters of this dhāraṇī in my mind.
After several repetitions, my mind suddenly became focused.
At that time, I was delighted.
It is like a person who obtains hundreds of thousands of pounds of gold.
The person has no one who knows, and the inner joy is unstoppable.
I was also like this at that time.
Practicing for several years, flying without obstruction.
Seeing the Buddhas of the ten directions and three periods of time.
Later, there were practitioners who practiced according to the Dharma.

original: 觀世音說隨願陀羅尼南無觀世音菩薩　但提咃　呿羅婆多　呿羅婆多　伽呵婆多　伽婆多　伽𠲎多　莎呵行此陀羅尼法。
analyzed: 觀世音說隨願陀羅尼南無觀世音菩薩　但提咃　呿羅婆多　呿羅婆多　伽呵婆多　伽婆多　伽𠲎多　莎呵行此陀羅尼法。
translated: Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva's Spoken Dhāraṇī for Fulfilling Wishes Namo Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva, Dantita, Caravarta, Caravarta, Gagavarta, Gagavarta, Gagavarta, Svaha. The method of practicing this dhāraṇī.
One should be in a quiet place, wholeheartedly worship and circumambulate the stupa.
Recite this dhāraṇī 12,000 times.
One will then see Avalokitesvara Bodhisattva.
All wishes will be fulfilled as one desires.

original: 乞夢即知吉凶陀羅尼南無三寶　南無摩尼跋陀大鬼神將　摩訶但茶　陀羅尼　尼律師那氷伽梨　呵梨氷伽梨㖑　阿跋多蛇　阿跋多蛇　摩尼跋陀林　摩訶乾豆　波乾陀　提波燒香散華。
analyzed: 乞夢即知吉凶陀羅尼南無三寶　南無摩尼跋陀大鬼神將　摩訶但茶　陀羅尼　尼律師那氷伽梨　呵梨氷伽梨㖑　阿跋多蛇　阿跋多蛇　摩尼跋陀林　摩訶乾豆　波乾陀　提波燒香散華。
translated: If one requests a dream, one will know the auspicious and inauspicious dhāraṇī. Namo to the Three Jewels, namo to Maṇibhadra, the great ghost spirit general, mahā-tantra, dhāraṇī, nirvāṇa, hīnakalāpa, hīnakalāpa, avadāna, avadāna, maṇibhadra forest, mahā-gandha, pākaṇṭha, tibhuvana. Burn incense and scatter flowers.
Recite one hundred and eight times in front of the Buddha.
Go to bed and do not speak to others again.
If one wishes to do something, in a dream,
One will see whether it can be obtained or not, whether it can be accomplished or not.

original: 除一切顛狂病陀羅尼那暮勒囊　梨蛇蛇　那暮阿梨陀　婆路䩭提一舍　婆羅蛇菩提薩埵蛇　摩訶薩埵蛇　多擲哆　至梨彌　至梨　勒叉勒叉　摩訶梨蛇　婆路䩭提一舍　婆羅蛇　莎呵此呪能除一切顛欺狂病者。
analyzed: 除一切顛狂病陀羅尼那暮勒囊　梨蛇蛇　那暮阿梨陀　婆路䩭提一舍　婆羅蛇菩提薩埵蛇　摩訶薩埵蛇　多擲哆　至梨彌　至梨　勒叉勒叉　摩訶梨蛇　婆路䩭提一舍　婆羅蛇　莎呵此呪能除一切顛欺狂病者。
translated: Namo le naṃ / lisha naṃ / amo lisha tā / boluo titi / she boluo sha / pútísà tā / móhē sà tā / duō jì dùō / zhì límí / zhì límí / lùóchā lùóchā / móhē lisha / boluo titi / she boluo sha / shā hā This dhāraṇī can cure all kinds of insanity and illness.
One should tie a string around the neck of the person.
If it is a five-colored string,

original: 若無五色應用赤縷以此呪呪之三遍。
analyzed: 若無五色應用赤縷以此呪呪之三遍。
translated: if there is no five-colored string, one should use a red string and recite this dhāraṇī three times over it.
Tie the string in three knots.
It can immediately cure all kinds of insanity and illness.

original: 除怖畏陀羅尼南無佛陀耶　南無達摩蛇　南無僧伽蛇　南無阿利陀　南無路抧汦　舍婆羅蛇　菩提薩埵蛇　摩訶薩埵蛇　多擲哆　呵梨迦比梨　伽羅氷伽羅𠼠　蛇奢茂抧　薩𠼠豆　守鍮闍泥　薩𠼠豆　烏呵蛇彌　慕呵蛇彌　闍婆蛇彌　貪婆　莎呵若有善男子善女人。
analyzed: 除怖畏陀羅尼南無佛陀耶　南無達摩蛇　南無僧伽蛇　南無阿利陀　南無路抧汦　舍婆羅蛇　菩提薩埵蛇　摩訶薩埵蛇　多擲哆　呵梨迦比梨　伽羅氷伽羅𠼠　蛇奢茂抧　薩𠼠豆　守鍮闍泥　薩𠼠豆　烏呵蛇彌　慕呵蛇彌　闍婆蛇彌　貪婆　莎呵若有善男子善女人。
translated: Dhāraṇī for Removing Fear Namo buddhāya, namo dharmāya, namo saṃghāya, namo 'rhatāṃ, namo rājñāṃ, śāstra-nāgāṃ, bodhisattva-nāgāṃ, mahā-sattva-nāgāṃ, trāyastriṃśānām, hārīkīpārī, garuḍa-garuḍa-nāgāṃ, śāśa-kṛti, sarva-nāgāṃ, śuddha-jāti-nāgāṃ, ugra-nāgāṃ, mūrdha-nāgāṃ, jāva-nāgāṃ, trāva-svāhā If there are good men and good women,
who read and recite this dhāraṇī,
they will be able to remove all fears.
Whether it be from water, fire, thieves, evil ghosts and spirits,
tigers, wolves, poisonous beasts, or various other kinds of dangers,
they will all be able to ward them off.
If one encounters thieves on the road,

original: 取一把土以此陀羅尼呪七遍。
analyzed: 取一把土以此陀羅尼呪七遍。
translated: take a handful of soil and recite this dhāraṇī seven times,
sprinkle it towards the thieves, and they will be subdued.
The eyes of the two people did not see each other, and they went on their way.

original: 結藥界陀羅尼多擲咃　秀咩　秀摩婆帝　婆留支　婆羅𭒂　摩摩利　呵摩利泥　摩帝　迦囉摩　莎呵應以此持呪童女所作縷呪二十一遍作二十一結。
analyzed: 結藥界陀羅尼多擲咃　秀咩　秀摩婆帝　婆留支　婆羅𭒂　摩摩利　呵摩利泥　摩帝　迦囉摩　莎呵應以此持呪童女所作縷呪二十一遍作二十一結。
translated: The Dhāraṇī for Consecrating Medicine: Tathāgata, Śūme, Śūmavadi, Varuṇa, Varuṇa, Mamāri, Hamāri, Mādi, Karāma, Svaha. With this mantra, the girl should recite the mantra twenty-one times and tie twenty-one knots.
Tie it to the finger.
The kheṭaka stake has already been driven into the ground.
This is called the method for consecrating medicine.
Then, Faxi, dig the ground.
There will be various images.
If you obtain an elephant image,
eat it, tie it to the throat, and go.
Evil beasts such as lions, tigers, and wolves,
when they see it, will flee and dare not approach.

original: 若食之得見那伽若與唎交會。
analyzed: 若食之得見那伽若與唎交會。
translated: If you eat it, you will see nāgas. If you have intercourse with a rākṣasī,
your strength will not be exhausted even if you do it a hundred or a thousand times.
If you obtain a horse image, grind it and eat it.
If you mix it with drink and drink it,
you will be able to fly.

original: 空中七日行二千餘禪水不沒。
analyzed: 空中七日行二千餘禪水不沒。
translated: In the sky, for seven days, he walked more than two thousand yojanas, and the water did not submerge him.
If one obtains the image of an ox,
the power of the food is equivalent to that of ten elephants.
A lifespan of two hundred years is not a doubt.
If one obtains the image of a woman and holds it while walking,
one will attain sovereignty over all lands.
In one day, one can walk more than a hundred yojanas.
The feet are not tired.
Wherever one goes, one is loved by others.
One's words are as sweet as nectar.
Whoever hears them will joyfully believe and accept them.
People enjoy seeing one and love to do things for others.
If one obtains the image of a man and always carries it while walking,

original: 於一切處皆得代尸若飲之。
analyzed: 於一切處皆得代尸若飲之。
translated: in all places one will be able to substitute for others. If one drinks it,
one's lifespan will be two hundred years.
One's physical strength will be incomparable and invincible.
One will have dignified appearance, intelligence, majestic virtue, and radiance.
If one gives birth to a child, it will also resemble the father.
All signs of old age will disappear and one will become young again.
One will understand all worldly matters.
Hearing ten thousand verses and their meanings, one can uphold them.
The physical eyes become pure and can clearly see Niti.
Brave and strong, with much power.
If one obtains the image of a ewe,
Eating it for thirteen months without hunger.
Good at practicing colored fighting, with no front.
The mind is peaceful and good, the body is large and fat.

original: 若得孔雀像者即自食之食。
analyzed: 若得孔雀像者即自食之食。
translated: If one obtains the image of a peacock, one eats it.
All poisons are powerless.
Seeing more than a hundred meditation matters.
If one obtains the image of a snake and holds it while walking,
No one in the world can do anything to it.
If used to anoint the body, one gains great power.

original: 能與和修吉龍鬪不被毒害。
analyzed: 能與和修吉龍鬪不被毒害。
translated: One can fight with the dragon Vasuki without being harmed by its poison.
If bitten or fed bad poison,
And used to anoint the body, one suffers no pain.
If used to anoint the eyes, one can see Niti.
If one obtains the image of a deer, holding it while walking,
No one in the world can do anything to it.

original: 若得鹿像共蛇像相纏者。
analyzed: 若得鹿像共蛇像相纏者。
translated: If one obtains the image of a deer entwined with the image of a snake,

original: 又言龜像食之身䩕如石。
analyzed: 又言龜像食之身䩕如石。
translated: It is also said that the tortoise-shaped food is as hard as a stone.
If used to smear the body, the body cannot be destroyed.
Even vajra cannot destroy it.
Even if the asuras strike it, they cannot destroy it.
There is no defecation or urination.
If one obtains a frog, hold it and walk.
One will not sink in water.
If one enters the water, there will be no harm.
Always make it happy and invincible.

original: 若得貝形似吉祥果持之而行。
analyzed: 若得貝形似吉祥果持之而行。
translated: If one obtains a conch shell shaped like a auspicious fruit, hold it and walk.
When worldly people see it, its majestic light is like the sun.

original: 若王聞來出百步迎其人。
analyzed: 若王聞來出百步迎其人。
translated: If the king hears it coming, he will come out a hundred steps to welcome that person.

original: 心念欲作萬事王悉受用。
analyzed: 心念欲作萬事王悉受用。
translated: Mentally think of wanting to do myriad things, and the king will use them all.
Do everything that is done for him.
Grant all wishes.

original: 復有求夢陀羅尼多嚊他呵梨呵梨　無呵尼三無呵尼　莎呵此是求夢呪誦七遍臥時誦。
analyzed: 復有求夢陀羅尼多嚊他呵梨呵梨　無呵尼三無呵尼　莎呵此是求夢呪誦七遍臥時誦。
translated: There is also a dream-seeking dhāraṇī: Mukhātha harī hari | Mukhani trimukhani | Svaha This is the dream-seeking mantra, recite it seven times before going to bed.

original: 若無所見至一七日必有所見。
analyzed: 若無所見至一七日必有所見。
translated: If you do not see anything after seven days, you will definitely see something.

original: 佛說呪時氣病經南無佛　南無法　南無比丘僧　南無過去七佛　南無現在諸佛　南無諸佛　南無諸佛弟子禮是已便說是呪。
analyzed: 佛說呪時氣病經南無佛　南無法　南無比丘僧　南無過去七佛　南無現在諸佛　南無諸佛　南無諸佛弟子禮是已便說是呪。
translated: When the Buddha spoke the spell, the Qi Disease Sutra said: Homage to the Buddha, Homage to the Dharma, Homage to the Sangha of Bhikshus, Homage to the Seven Buddhas of the Past, Homage to the Buddhas of the Present, Homage to All Buddhas, Homage to All Buddhas' Disciples. Having made this homage, he then spoke this spell.
It will be accomplished as wished.

original: 阿佉尼　尼佉尼　阿佉那　尼佉尼　阿比羅　慢多梨　尼佉尼　波陀尼　波提梨　南無佛　南無法　南無比丘僧　南無過去七佛　南無現在諸佛　南無諸佛弟子　南無諸佛　南無諸師弟子今我所呪即從如願。
analyzed: 阿佉尼　尼佉尼　阿佉那　尼佉尼　阿比羅　慢多梨　尼佉尼　波陀尼　波提梨　南無佛　南無法　南無比丘僧　南無過去七佛　南無現在諸佛　南無諸佛弟子　南無諸佛　南無諸師弟子今我所呪即從如願。
translated: Akhani nikhani akhana nikhani abhira manatari nikhani patani patiri homage to the Buddha homage to the Dharma homage to the Sangha of Bhikshus homage to the Seven Buddhas of the Past homage to the Buddhas of the Present homage to the disciples of all Buddhas homage to all Buddhas homage to all teachers' disciples now what I am chanting will be accomplished as wished.

original: 若人得時氣疾病縷結七過呪文并書此上鬼神名字著紙上繫著縷頭讀呪時當齋戒清淨澡漱燒香正心乃說。

If a person walks east, take refuge in that Buddha.
The south, west, north, and four intermediate directions are also like this.
If you want to lie down, call the Buddha of the lower direction.
When getting up, call the Buddha of the upper direction.
